product_name: Timex Ironman Move X20 Activity Monitor - Large
long_description: This 'round-the-clock activity monitor uses advanced 3D accelerometer technology to accurately track and display your steps, distance, calories burned, sleep patterns, time of day and date.
short_description: This 'round-the-clock activity monitor uses advanced 3D accelerometer technology to accurately track and display your steps, distance, calories burned, sleep patterns, time of day and date.
